ingredients.ingredient: ¾ pound deli sliced corned beef

cookingTips: Drain sauerkraut thoroughly to remove excess moisture that makes bread soggy
Spread dressing on both inside bread slices to create moisture barrier
Build sandwich in order: bread, dressing, meat, sauerkraut, cheese, bread. Press gently while cooking to meld ingredients
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How should I layer and cook a Reuben sandwich in a skillet over a campfire to get crispy bread and melted cheese without drying it out?
